rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open-air central space with ornate Art Deco decorative elements and garden features. Encourages natural light and ventilation, adheres to Vastu by being oriented for positive energy flow.

rooms.description: A spacious area with Art Deco accents such as geometric patterns and luxurious finishes. Opens directly to the courtyard for enhanced natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-appointed kitchen featuring period-appropriate design elements, functional layout adhering to Vastu principles where practicality meets aesthetics.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Sleek guest bathroom with Art Deco fixtures and minimalistic yet elegant finishes, ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility space designed for storage or additional amenities, in keeping with efficient use of space.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: Stately entryway featuring Art Deco detailing and a grand arch that aligns with Vastu principles by inviting auspicious energy.

openings.name: Courtyard Entrance
